item.title: Ueberauth_cas with Phoenix (Elixir)
item.description: How do a connection between cas and phoenix? This post I want to talk about :ueberauth_cas, since I haven’t found a example to be used. ueberauth_cas Is a central Authentication for a ticket from any cas authentication View github: https://github.com/marceldegraaf/ueberauth_cas Install dependencies You should know, this dependency needs to ueberauth to its functio, than you have a little information about this dependency (ueberauth): https://github.com/ueberauth/ueberauth First Step Add dependencies ## Application def application do [ mod: {ExampleUeberauthCas.
